title: Offside
description: This Ladies' Man Is Thinking Of Switching Sides When He Meets This Football Bad Boy   Football’s hottest, bad boy is Marco's brand new neighbor. Marco, a lifelong lover of the ladies, has never been interested in men but there is just something about Eric Polwski.  Marco can’t get the blonde haired, blue-eyed athlete out of his head. Eric is on TV screens, underwear ads, and sunning himself in the backyard. Now his bad boy ways have gotten him into trouble.  Marco wants Eric to slake his curiosity: For just one night he wants to know what it's like to be with another man.  Eric has an athlete's body that was born to win. But in his world, full of fakes and users, Marco is the only real thing. He doesn't want forever, he doesn't want pretense, and he just wants to satisfy some curiosity. If Marco wants one night, he’ll take it until he wants more. Even though Marco fights hard at the idea of this turning into anything serious, the winner in this football bad boy will do whatever it takes to win Marco's heart.  This Is A Romance Short Story
author: Van Cole
